TestDescription.name: Apache 2.x version older than 2.0.48

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: [coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break]Apache has reported a vulnerability in the mod_cgid module when the threaded MPM is used. This could potentially expose sensitive information or incorrectly grant unauthorized access.[break][break][navy]Affected Apache versions (up to 2.0.47).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Impact: Information disclosure, unauthorized access or denial of service.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade Apache 2.x to the latest version.
